doc: Daikin Climate integration, when using set_temperature service the unit is also turned on
When I use the service set_temperature to set the target temperature for my Daikin wifi unit, the unit it is also turned on.
In this way I cannot change the temperature if the unit is off, I can do this only when is on.
My expectation is to be able to do so also when the unit is turned off, without anything happening in the room.
### What is version of Home Assistant Core has the issue?
